data.name: PasswordResetEmail
data.value:
X-Sender: do-not-reply@eastsussex.gov.uk X-Receiver: example@eastsussex.gov.uk MIME-Version: 1.0 From: do-not-reply@eastsussex.gov.uk To: webstaff@eastsussex.gov.uk Date: 19 Dec 2017 10:16:02 +0000 Subject: Umbraco: Reset Password Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Your username to login to the Umbraco back-office is: = example

Click here to reset your password = or copy/paste this URL into your browser:

https://hostname= .azurewebsites.net/umbraco/ValidatePasswordResetCode?u=3D0= &r=3DJqc3aS%2Fm5nn1JtpnOslF9SiAp5GXCoyGpraaIY1vCQZRTKi23OTbn%2FT1= K9ayPFOexLC35PXfUc70gCl8v6k7AOfE9IjHZUVmMjbQOS1LXX2ccfpwVRDJCt17j= CET%2BXERsvblpQ%3D%3D
